title: Trump Jr. drops planned foreign policy speech in India
text:
Trump Jr. drops planned foreign policy speech in India 5:17pm EST - 01:46 
U.S. President Donald Trump's son dropped a planned speech on foreign affairs in New Delhi on Friday and instead took part in a 'Fireside Chat' after ethics experts said he should avoid wading into policy issues as a private citizen. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump's son dropped a planned speech on foreign affairs in New Delhi on Friday and instead took part in a 'Fireside Chat' after ethics experts said he should avoid wading into policy issues as a private citizen.
